issue.title: Pose addition and subtraction needs work

content.raw:
`ApplyTransform` is a good idea.

Pose addition and subtraction operations (`operator+` and `operator-`) appears correct based on unit tests.
Based on comments here, we need to:

 * clarify documentation as suggested, and
 * add to documentation stating that `operator*` is exactly the same as `operator+`
content.html:
ApplyTransform is a good idea.

Pose addition and subtraction operations (operator+ and operator-) appears correct based on unit tests. Based on comments here, we need to:

  • clarify documentation as suggested, and
  • add to documentation stating that operator* is exactly the same as operator+
